sentences.en: The account of spiritual struggle that follows has a humbling and numinous power.
sentences.cn: 之后关于精神挣扎的叙述有一种令人心生卑微之感的神秘力量。

sentences.en: The numinous treasure rites are the mainstream of Taoist rites.
sentences.cn: 灵宝斋法是道教斋法的主流.

words.tran_cn: 精神上的；超自然的；神圣的；庄严的

trans.tran_cn: 神圣的，神秘的，超自然的，令人敬畏而又向往的
trans.tran_en: having a mysterious and holy quality, which makes you feel that God is present
